Activity: Log in to the OA system and check emails, respond to any relevant communication regarding level design.
Meet with @lvdn-1 again to finalize the list of blockouts to be tested for flow and pacing.
Set up a testing session for the blockouts created; gather a group of @qtest-1 (QA Tester) and volunteer playtesters.
Conduct testing on blockouts to evaluate flow and pacing; gather feedback from testers.
Analyze feedback and identify key areas of improvement noted during the testing session.
Compile notes on the testing outcomes and prepare to share with the development team.
